summary: Completed comprehensive testing of nQCrm MVP - modern CRM dashboard with dark theme and green branding. All core functionality working correctly with minor frontend console warnings.

design_issues.issue: HTML hydration errors in console due to table structure - div elements nested in table elements
design_issues.impact: Console warnings only, no functional impact

design_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent accessibility

passed_tests: All 24 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Dashboard metrics display ($17,000 revenue, 3 active projects, 3 clients, $1,416.67 MRR)
Revenue bar chart and payments line chart visibility
Navigation to all pages (Dashboard, Projects, Clients, Invoices, Payments)
Projects CRUD operations and dialog functionality
Invoices tabs (All, Paid, Pending, Overdue) and tab switching
Dark theme with green branding (#00C676) implementation
Sample data seeding (3 clients, 4 projects, 4 invoices, 2 payments)
